Configs¶

Architecture templates¶

class configs.DefaultResnet[source]¶

Config responsible for setting parameters for ResNet architecture.

Parameters

  • name¶ (str) – Name of the architecture

  • expansion¶ (int) – Model expantion

  • layers¶ (tuple) – TOADD

  • model¶ (LitModel) – Base model with implemented logic

  • depth¶ (int) – Model depth

  • in_channels¶ (int) – Number of input channels

  • out_channels¶ (int) – Number of output channels

  • bias¶ (bool) – TOADD

  • activation¶ (torch.nn.Module) – Model activation function

Callbacks templates¶

class configs.DefaultCallbacks[source]¶

Config responsible for passing callbacks of BaseCallback type. Providing new callbacks require adding new class field field with any name

Metrics templates¶

class configs.DefaultMetrics[source]¶

Config responsible for passing metrics of BaseMetric type. Providing new metrics require adding new class field as dict with any name

Underneath description of field parameters

Parameters

  • metric¶ (BaseMetric) – metric class

  • plot¶ (bool) – flag responsible for plotting final metrics

  • kwargs¶ (dict) – dict with parameters for metric function

Optimizers templates¶

class configs.SchedulerCommonKwargs[source]¶

Class storing default parameters common for all schedulers

class configs.DefaultOptimizers[source]¶

Config responsible for passing optimizers of BaseOptimizer type. Providing new optimizers require adding new class field as dict with any name.

Underneath description of field parameters

Parameters

  • scheduler¶ (BaseOptim) – optimizer class

  • kwargs¶ (dict) – dict with parameters for optimizer class

  • character¶ (str) – ‘normal’ for standard model, ‘disc’ for discriminator in GAN model, ‘gen’ for generator in GAN model

class configs.DefaultSchedulers[source]¶

Config responsible for passing schedulers of BaseScheduler type. Providing new schedulers require adding new class field as dict with same name as field name of optimizer, which has to be used with scheduler.

Underneath description of field parameters

Parameters

  • scheduler¶ (BaseScheduler) – scheduler class

  • common_kwargs¶ (SchedulerCommonKwargs) – params common for all schedulers

  • scheduler_kwargs¶ (dict) – dict with parameters for scheduler class

Training templates¶

class configs.DefaultTraining[source]¶

Config responsible for setting parameters common for every architecture.

Parameters

  • epochs¶ (int) – Number of epochs in training

  • batch_size¶ (int) – Number of elements in one batch

  • save¶ (bool) – Parameter responsible for saving model

  • seed¶ (int) – Random seed for whole project

  • dtype¶ (torch.dtype) – Type of dats used with model

  • loader_func¶ (Callable) – Function loading data from folder “.data”

  • loss¶ (BaseLoss) – Name of loss function

  • experiments_dir¶ (str) – Path to root directory of model experiments

  • test¶ (bool) – Flag responsible for calculating test set

  • weigths_summary¶ (str) –

    Prints a summary of the weights when training begins. Supported options:

    • top: only the top-level modules will be recorded

    • full: summarizes all layers and their submodules

  • gpus¶ – Which GPUs to train on.

  • profiler¶ – To profile individual steps during training and assist in identifying bottlenecks.
